attributes.title: oops i did it again
attributes.review: so, downloaded this app because tiktok. so tiktok is a way of news and when i opening it i saw fake news it took me to see the grinch and then the grinch wacked me in the head therefore putting my safety in danger and thennnn i went and saw the lorax because he SpEaKs FoR tHe TrEeS and he told me that the trees get so much publicity through tiktok therefor there will be many things that loose their popularity if it is banned. do u want us gen z to take over facebook ?! i mean really come in now we just wanna meet the grinch y’all stupid fr okay yeah the lorax is nice i would def recommend but the grinch is the reason for this rating :)

attributes.title: no❤️
attributes.review: i downloaded this app and then my phone started acting up. it died and now won’t hold a charge. it keeps sending me pictures of the annoying orange?? i was disappointed in the way it works but more importantly, i am now seeing things. i think. everything i see has an orange tint and i see ✨your president✨ everywhere. but this time, the toupee is gone and he is completely n*de! this is unacceptable. i removed the app from my phone and these things are starting to go away (by the grace of God himself) but i still see a trace of him everywhere. could he have brainwashed me?? 🤭 DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS APP UNLESS YOU WANT TO SEE BAD THINGS 🥰😔

attributes.title: it drowned my gold fish ?!?! 😥
attributes.review: this app LITERALLY drowned my gold fish . when i opened the app, an orange hand came out if my phone grabbed my closet who turned out to be my fish and then it tried to strangle it but also let it go into the water. it then proceeded to keep my fish inside of the water as if it can stay down there without dying?!?! 😡 i am absolutely FURIOUS about this app . they should be more cautious about the consequences that hand coming out of your phone can do to your innocent fish 😭 that is why i rated this a one 1 😩 Rest In Peace air dried pizza roll on a stick mixed with a blow dryer and water 🧚‍♀️ you will be missed by many 😥

attributes.title: work of the devil
attributes.review: i downloaded this app with high hopes. i thought i would be getting informed of trumps reelection. i am very disappointed. all it did was cause paranormal activities in my home. first i was hearing creepy noises throughout the night and then it became books falling off the bookshelves. one night i woke up because i was punched in the stomach! and i live alone! (except for the hostages in the basement but they can’t escape) even my hostages started acting weird!! i threw holy water at them but they just hissed back. i’ve deleted this app multiple times but there is still a unsettling presence in my household. Mr trump IS in fact the devil.

attributes.title: Worst app ever😤😤
attributes.review:
The FitnessGram Pacer Test is a multistage aerobic capacity test that progressively gets more difficult as it continues. The 20 meter pacer test will begin in 30 seconds. Line up at the start. The running speed starts slowly but gets faster each minute after you hear this signal bodeboop. A sing lap should be completed every time you hear this sound. ding Remember to run in a straight line and run as long as possible. The second time you fail to complete a lap before the sound, your test is over. The test will begin on the word start. On your mark. Get ready!… Start. ding﻿

Thank you for your time

attributes.title: Blew up my phone...my hand are burned now✨🔪
attributes.review: You see I got this so I could vote for my 🗳 ✨amazing✨ and ✨lovely✨ Cheeto puff🥕 president💕but it took 10 hours👽 to download and after I finally✨got it it erased all of my data🙈😔Gosh all I wanted to do was vote for my daddy and savior😔💕But once I got it it gave me a ✨pedo vibe✨ and I was not here for it🔪After I got over every obstacle, when I tried  to vote for my beloved president it sent me a message saying that I was a racist and a homophobic and I don’t understand why🙈 and when I tried to vote again my phone blew up✨😳overall do not recommend this app at all it was a complete waste of time❌🔪✨🧚🏻

attributes.title: You did this💖💅🏽🥰Now never do it again😺🧚🏻🌠
attributes.review: I downloaded this app having high expectations bc it was app designed for our aMaZiNg president, yet it took 6 months to download😾 Next it hacked my phone and showed me videos of props pig and daddy pig going at it🙀next 4 Oompa Loompas showed up to my door, and carried me straight out of my house🤷🏼‍♀️🧚🏻💅🏽 they took me to Willy Wonkas chocolate factory, and then trump appears on the tv there🍤 they kidnapped my parents and best friend but they didn’t know we both had the powers of fairy’s, so we got our phones out and left fairy comments on trumps insta, and he and his little shrimp got stressed out that we escaped🥰

attributes.title: Don’t even think about downloading
attributes.review: I wish I could rate -99,999,999,999,999,999,999,999,999,999 stars! The app is absolutely trash and took about 6 months to finally download. It takes up ALL of your storage! I had to delete every single app on my device and delete all of my pictures. Not to mention how many racist remarks were made from the president himself. You also get calls from random numbers saying you need to pay to have your own freedom. Absolute waste of money and time. Don’t download it unless you want viruses on your device and you want to keep your phone number, emails, past photos, etc... a secret.

attributes.title: 🔥Offensive character🔥
attributes.review: Usually I try to be very nice when reviewing apps but this one I do not feel deserves it. It shows a very controversial and out right terrible person who encourages sexism,rape, pedophiles, racist, murder against anyone who is not a close minded white man, homophobia, and more offensive things that the news should cover more on this awful man. Instead of acting like he’s an angel who wants the best for our country when in reality he wants the best for himself and that includes being and doing probably all of the following, please get rid of this app and with it the bootleg Obama that we call our president! ✨✨🧚‍♀️Thank you🧚‍♀️✨✨
